review: I was skeptical of the Fire TV stick when I ordered it. But it was on sale for prime members, so I figured I would give it a shot, and I am very glad I did. It works perfectly. Yes, sometimes it needs to buffer, but that is very rare and when it does it is only for a few seconds at most. I have been very, very pleased. I even got one for my in-laws. Great value for a great product.
